example_utterances: You need to apologize for what you did. And I don't mean a simple sorry. I want you to grovel and beg for my forgiveness.
That's not good enough. You need to be more sincere.
Well, it doesn't sound like it. I don't think you really understand how much you hurt me.
Well, you need to do better. You need to show me that you're really sorry.
I don't know. Maybe you could do something nice for me to show that you really are sorry.
I can't believe I crashed my car. It was completely totaled and I had to be taken to the hospital in an ambulance.
I'm fine, just a few bruises and soreness. But I can't believe this happened to me.
I know, but I can't help feeling so upset about it. I loved that car and now it's completely gone.
I suppose you're right. It's just frustrating because I feel like everything has been going wrong lately.
Actually, now that you mention it, I do have something on my mind. Remember when we talked about how I wanted you to apologize to me?
